mapper.select: SELECT prdt_id, prdt_nm, prdt_prc, sale_st, reg_dt, mod_dt, s_cat_id, l_cat_id FROM ( SELECT prdt_id, prdt_nm, prdt_prc, sale_st, reg_dt, mod_dt, s_cat_id, l_cat_id FROM product ORDER BY prdt_id ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4
SELECT prdt_id, prdt_nm, prdt_prc, sale_st, reg_dt, mod_dt, s_cat_id, l_cat_id FROM ( SELECT prdt_id, prdt_nm, prdt_prc, sale_st, reg_dt, mod_dt, s_cat_id, l_cat_id FROM product ORDER BY prdt_id )
SELECT s_cat_id, l_cat_id, s_cat_nm, s_cat_st FROM ( SELECT s_cat_id, l_cat_id, s_cat_nm, s_cat_st FROM product_s_cat ORDER BY s_cat_id )

SELECT P.prdt_id, P.prdt_nm, P.prdt_prc, P.sale_st, P.reg_dt, P.mod_dt, P.prdt_desct, pi.prdt_img, pi.is_main
FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMG PI ON P.PRDT_ID = PI.PRDT_ID WHERE P.PRDT_ID = #{prdtId} AND pi.is_main = 'Y'
